item.description:
Please meet at the front door of The Essex condo (11 Church St, Salem - across from what some folks call "the Almy's parking lot" - you'll see the green awning) and then Sandy will take everyone downstairs to the Essex Room. Those who arrive later will need to call Sandy to get in (978-219-9292). Her number/directions will be posted on the front door.

 

The on-street and metered lot parking (small lots) is free in the evening. Large parking lot is only free after 8pm. If you park in the garage Sandy can sell you a validation sticker that gives you free parking.

 

Please bring your favorite games to play. Sandy will have a few (Luck of the Draw, Fluxx, Uno, Cribbage, Yahtzee, and several decks of cards). Nearby the function room, there is a rec area with a pool table and ping pong table that can accommodate a few players.

Beverages available, but feel free to bring snacks to share.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Games at The Essex
